Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of teams

Description: Minimize the total budget spent on the project

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for completed features

Description: Minimize the total severity of unresolved blockers

Description: Minimize the number of sprints where the goal was not achieved

Description: Maximize the total availability of all workers

Description: Minimize the total estimated effort for all tasks in the sprint backlog

Description: Maximize the average certified skill level of the team

Name: minimize_sprint_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of all planned sprints
